languages.text: {n}Псайкер прыскает со смеху, будто вы крайне удачно пошутили. Заметив, что вы все еще ждете ответа на свой вопрос, она одергивается.{/n} "А... вы это серьезно? Ну, тут ведь как, Лорд-капитан — соседи мои из-за дверки снова вернулись в мою болезную головушку. Соскучились, видать, галдят с новой силой. Но, пожалуй, так получше будет, чем у ксеноса на побегушках самой над собой эксперименты ставить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Псайкер прыскает со смеху, будто вы крайне удачно пошутили. Заметив, что вы все еще ждете ответа на свой вопрос, она одергивается.{/n} "А... вы это серьезно? Ну, тут ведь как, Лорд-капитан — соседи мои из-за дверки снова вернулись в мою болезную головушку. Соскучились, видать, галдят с новой силой. Но, пожалуй, так получше будет, чем у ксеноса на побегушках самой над собой эксперименты ставить".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Псайкер прыскает со смеху, будто вы крайне удачно пошутили. Заметив, что вы все еще ждете ответа на свой вопрос, она одергивается.{/n} "А... вы это серьезно? Ну, тут ведь как, Лорд-капитан — соседи мои из-за дверки снова вернулись в мою болезную головушку. Соскучились, видать, галдят с новой силой. Но, пожалуй, так получше будет, чем у ксеноса на побегушках самой над собой эксперименты ставить".

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，仿佛你刚刚开了个好笑的玩笑一样。当她看到你还在等待她回答时，她直起了身子。{/n}“等等……你是认真的吗？老实说，舰长大人，我那群邻居们又从后门跑了进来，回到了我发了疯的小脑袋里。他们一定很想念我，因为他们比之前更吵闹了。但我猜，这总比变成异形手里的棋子，让他们在我身上做实验要好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉哼了一声，仿佛你刚刚开了个好笑的玩笑一样。当她看到你还在等待她回答时，她直起了身子。{/n}“等等……你是认真的吗？老实说，舰长大人，我那群邻居们又从后门跑了进来，回到了我发了疯的小脑袋里。他们一定很想念我，因为他们比之前更吵闹了。但我猜，这总比变成异形手里的棋子，让他们在我身上做实验要好。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

languages.text: {n}Idira se ríe como si acabaras de contarle un chiste buenísimo. Cuando ve que esperas su respuesta, se pone firme.{/n} «Espere... ¿va en serio? Verá, Lord Capitán, mis vecinos al otro lado de la puerta han vuelto aullando a mi pobre mente enfermiza. Deben de haberme echado de menos, porque hacen más ruido que nunca. Pero supongo que eso es mejor que ser un peón de los xenos y estar sometida a experimentos».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

Verá, Lord Capitán, mis vecinos al otro lado de la puerta han vuelto aullando a mi pobre mente enfermiza. Deben de haberme echado de menos, porque hacen más ruido que nunca. Pero supongo que eso es mejor que ser un peón de los xenos y estar sometida a experimentos».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは、まるであなたが素晴らしい冗談を言ったかのように鼻を鳴らす。あなたがまだ答えを待っているのを見て、彼女は背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「待って…本気なの？ロード・キャプテン、扉の向こうの隣人たちが、病んだ小さな心に殺到するように戻ってきたの。あたいを恋しがっているに違いないわ。これまで以上に騒がしいもの。でも、異種族の手先になって、己を実験するよりはマシかもしれないわね」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは、まるであなたが素晴らしい冗談を言ったかのように鼻を鳴らす。あなたがまだ答えを待っているのを見て、彼女は背筋を伸ばした。{/n}「待って…本気なの？ロード・キャプテン、扉の向こうの隣人たちが、病んだ小さな心に殺到するように戻ってきたの。あたいを恋しがっているに違いないわ。これまで以上に騒がしいもの。でも、異種族の手先になって、己を実験するよりはマシかもしれないわね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schnaubt, als hättet Ihr eben einen hervorragenden Witz gemacht. Als sie sieht, dass Ihr noch immer auf eine Antwort wartet, richtet sie sich auf.{/n} "Augenblick ... Ihr meint das ernst? Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, meine Nachbarn von hinter der Tür sind wieder in meinen kranken kleinen Verstand gestürmt. Sie haben mich wohl vermisst, denn sie sind lauter als je zuvor. Doch das ist wohl besser, als eine Marionette der Xenos zu sein und Experimente an mir selbst durchzuführen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schnaubt, als hättet Ihr eben einen hervorragenden Witz gemacht. Als sie sieht, dass Ihr noch immer auf eine Antwort wartet, richtet sie sich auf.{/n} "Augenblick ... Ihr meint das ernst? Wisst Ihr, Lord Captain, meine Nachbarn von hinter der Tür sind wieder in meinen kranken kleinen Verstand gestürmt. Sie haben mich wohl vermisst, denn sie sind lauter als je zuvor. Doch das ist wohl besser, als eine Marionette der Xenos zu sein und Experimente an mir selbst durchzuführen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se met à rire, comme si vous veniez de raconter une bonne blague, mais se ressaisit dès qu'elle se rend compte que vous attendez vraiment une réponse.{/n} « Attendez... Vous êtes {mf|sérieux|sérieuse} ? En fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mes voisins de l'autre côté de la porte sont revenus à la charge dans mon petit esprit malade et j'ai dû beaucoup leur manquer, parce qu'ils font encore plus de bordel qu'avant. Mais bon, j'imagine que c'est toujours mieux que d'être un pion entre les mains des xénos, à faire des expériences sur moi-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se met à rire, comme si vous veniez de raconter une bonne blague, mais se ressaisit dès qu'elle se rend compte que vous attendez vraiment une réponse.{/n} « Attendez... Vous êtes {mf|sérieux|sérieuse} ? En fait, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mes voisins de l'autre côté de la porte sont revenus à la charge dans mon petit esprit malade et j'ai dû beaucoup leur manquer, parce qu'ils font encore plus de bordel qu'avant. Mais bon, j'imagine que c'est toujours mieux que d'être un pion entre les mains des xénos, à faire des expériences sur moi-même. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, âdeta muhteşem bir espri yapmışçasına kahkaha atıyor. Seni hâlen bir cevap beklerken gördüğündeyse toparlanıyor.{/n} "Bir saniye... Ciddi miydin? Lord Kaptan, vaziyet şu ki kapının ardındaki dostlarım, tüm gürültüleriyle bezgin zihnime yine akın ediyor. Herhâlde bana hasret kalmış olacaklar ki normale kıyasla pek fazla gürültü yapıyorlar. Her hâlükârda zenoların elinde oyuncak olup kendi kendime deneyler yapmamdan iyidir."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira snorts as if you just made an excellent joke. When she sees that you are still waiting for an answer, she straightens.{/n} "Wait... you're serious? The thing is, Lord Captain, my neighbours from behind the door have come roaring back into my sick little mind. They must have missed me, 'cause they're noisier than ever now. But I guess that's better than being a pawn in the hands of xenos, doing experiments on myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, âdeta muhteşem bir espri yapmışçasına kahkaha atıyor. Seni hâlen bir cevap beklerken gördüğündeyse toparlanıyor.{/n} "Bir saniye... Ciddi miydin? Lord Kaptan, vaziyet şu ki kapının ardındaki dostlarım, tüm gürültüleriyle bezgin zihnime bir kez daha akın ediyorlar. Herhâlde bana hasret kalmış olacaklar ki normale kıyasla pek fazla gürültü yapıyorlar. Her hâlükârda zenoların elinde oyuncak olup kendi kendime deneyler yapmamdan iyidir."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
